creator: aquint@ilog.fr
text:
Consider this SVG fragment:

    <text style="stroke:none; fill:blue; opacity: 0.5">
        <tspan>hello </tspan>
        <tspan style="opacity: 0.5">hello</tspan>
    </text>

In Batik 1.1 RC2 SVG Briwser, the "0.5" of the parent <text> element is not 
inherited by the two <tspan> elements. First <tspan> opacity should be "0.5" 
and second <tspan> should be 0.25

creator: tkormann@apache.org
text:
The 'opacity' property is not inherited according to:

http://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/masking.html#OpacityProperty

Batik displays the first tspan with an opacity of 1 (which is normal and the
default value).
